Your bowels
Haemorrhoids, commonly 
known as piles (see page 
80) are very common after 
delivery but they usually 
disappear within a few days. 
Eat plenty of fresh fruit, 
vegetables, salad, brown 
bread and wholegrain cereals, 
and drink plenty of water. This 
should make it easier and 
less painful when you pass a
